tokenForm.apiCliToken:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the API / CLI Token section
**UI Location**: Settings → API / CLI Token (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the API / CLI Token settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "API / CLI Token"
tokenForm.yourAuthenticationTokenIs:
**Functional Purpose**: Label preceding the display of the authentication token
**UI Location**: Settings → API / CLI Token (label above token)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the API / CLI Token settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your authentication token is:"
tokenForm.whereDoIUseThis:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text for information on using the token
**UI Location**: Settings → API / CLI Token (below the token display)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the API / CLI Token settings and needing guidance
**Technical Context**: This text is used as the `text` prop for a `ProminentLink` component.
**Current English**: "Where do I use this?"
tokenForm.resetToken:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to reset the authentication token
**UI Location**: Settings → API / CLI Token (action button in form footer)
**When Users See This**: When a user wants to generate a new API / CLI token
**Technical Context**: This text is used as the child of a `FormButton` component.
**Current English**: "Reset token"
tokenForm.yourTokenHasBeenReset:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message displayed after a token reset
**UI Location**: Settings → API / CLI Token (status message after successful reset)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully resetting the token
**Technical Context**: Appears within a success status div, alongside an icon.
**Current English**: "Your token has been reset"
